summary_of_the_change: The total purchase price for the Property was reduced from Four Hundred Seventy-Five Thousand Dollars ($475,000 USD) to Four Hundred Sixty-Five Thousand Dollars ($465,000 USD) (Sec. 2.1).
The earnest money deposit amount was increased from Fifteen Thousand Dollars ($15,000 USD) to Twenty Thousand Dollars ($20,000 USD) (Sec. 2.2).
